CHINESE_MEDICINE_NAME = #{chineseMedicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHINESE_MEDICINE_TYPE = #{chineseMedicineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHINESE_MEDICINE_ALIAS = #{chineseMedicineAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHINESE_MEDICINE_SOURCE = #{chineseMedicineSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tb_health_care_chinese_medicine set CHINESE_MEDICINE_NAME = #{chineseMedicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESE_MEDICINE_TYPE = #{chineseMedicineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESE_MEDICINE_ALIAS = #{chineseMedicineAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESE_MEDICINE_SOURCE = #{chineseMedicineSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESE_MEDICINE_HARVESTING = #{chineseMedicineHarvesting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESE_MEDICINE_TASTE = #{chineseMedicineTaste,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESE_MEDICINE_MER_TRO = #{chineseMedicineMerTro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESE_MEDICINE_EFFECT = #{chineseMedicineEffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESE_MEDICINE_USAGE = #{chineseMedicineUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESE_MEDICINE_STATUS = #{chineseMedicineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, cf.FILE_PATH FROM tb_health_care_chinese_medicine cm left join tb_culpro_file cf on cm.itemCode = cf.DATA_CODE
and CHINESE_MEDICINE_STATUS in (2,5)
and CHINESE_MEDICINE_STATUS in (1,2,3)
and CHINESE_MEDICINE_STATUS in (0,1,2,3,4,6)
order by cm.itemUpdateAt desc
